lido-text.string: Drag the letters to the correct boxes.

lido-cell.onEntry: this.place-items='center'; this.padding='0px'; this.gridTemplateColumns='repeat(auto-fill, minmax(143px, auto))'; this.gridTemplateRows='repeat(auto-fit, 146px)'; this.flexWrap='wrap';

lido-text.onEntry: this.color='#02C1C1';this.fontWeight='800';this.borderRadius='10px'; this.flex-shrink='0'; this.textShadow = '3px 0 white, -3px 0 white, 0 3px white, 0 -3px white';
this.color='#CF1565';this.fontWeight='800';this.borderRadius='10px'; this.flex-shrink='0'; this.textShadow = '3px 0 white, -3px 0 white, 0 3px white, 0 -3px white';

lido-text.string: Reorder the following shapes from the fewest flat faces to the most flat faces.
Match the jump number to the number reached when skip jumping by 3.
I am a colour. I am mentioned in the poem along with Yellow and Blue. My name starts with the letter 'R'. Who am I?

lido-cell.onEntry: this.overflow=' hidden'; this.justify-items='center'; this.grid-template-columns=' repeat(2, 1fr)'; this.gap=' 10px'; this.overflow-y=' auto';
this.overflow=' hidden'; this.justify-items='center'; this.grid-template-columns=' repeat(2, 1fr)'; this.gap=' 10px'; this.overflow-y=' auto'; this.flex-direction='column';
this.overflow=' hidden'; this.justify-items='center'; this.grid-template-columns=' repeat(2, 1fr)'; this.gap=' 10px'; this.overflow-y=' auto'; this.flex-direction='column';

lido-text.string: One night, he was really, really sad. He felt so upset because he could never finish counting all the stars. He even started to cry! "Ooohh... Ooohh... Ooohh Ooohh What is this? I am never able to complete my counting!"

One night, he was really, really sad. He felt so upset because he could never finish counting all the stars. He even started to cry! "Ooohh... Ooohh... Ooohh Ooohh What is this? I am never able to complete my counting!"

lido-text.onEntry: this.background='transparent'; this.borderRadius='15px'; this.display='flex'; this.alignItems='center'; this.justifyContent='center'; this.fontWeight='bold';
this.background='transparent'; this.borderRadius='15px'; this.display='flex'; this.alignItems='center'; this.justifyContent='center'; this.fontWeight='bold';

lido-container.aria-label: This is a multiple-option question. Select one option from the list.

lido-image.onTouch: this.visibilty='hidden'; pause.visibility='visible'; question.speak='true'; option1.speak='true'; option2.speak='true'; option3.speak='true'; option4.speak='true'; option5.speak='true'; option6.speak='true'; this.visibilty='visible'; pause.visibility='hidden';

lido-text.string: The game has been indefinitely postponed.
lido-text.value: The game has been indefinitely postponed

lido-wrap.onEntry: this.padding='30px'; this.borderRadius='20px'; this.gridTemplateColumns='auto auto auto'; this.alignContent='space-around'; this.justifyItems='center';

lido-image.onTouch: this.visibilty='hidden'; pause.visibility='visible'; question.speak='true'; option1.speak='true'; option2.speak='true'; option3.speak='true'; option4.speak='true'; option5.speak='true'; option6.speak='true'; this.visibilty='visible'; pause.visibility='hidden';

lido-text.string: Which animal is known as the king of the jungle?
